channel.description: https://github.com/VSCodium VScode but without the Microsoft Telemetry See section about migrating from VScod to VS codium https://github.com/VSCodium/vscodium/blob/a02839b466d8d01b8a61ea9611f0b74039538eae/DOCS.md#migrating-from-visual-studio-code-to-vscodium. It pulls from this server rather than Microsoft’s: https://open-vsx.org/. And you can manually download the extensions from microsoft https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/vscode if they haven’t been added to open-vsx.org yet.
